input_text:
Job Title: Manhattan Active Omni Consultant

Location: San Francisco Bay Area

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Analyst, Information Technology, Strategy/Planning

Description:
Infosys is seeking a Manhattan Active Omni Lead Consultant. As a Manhattan Active Omni Lead Consultant, you will anchor different phases of engagements primarily related to Manhattan OMNI. You will be responsible for the techno-functional solution of warehouse design, requirements specifications, consulting on functionalities implemented, testing of OMNI flows, providing functional consultation on the application, integration, and reports of enterprise solutions for Manhattan OMNI implementation with the objective of providing high-quality and value-adding solutions to customers within the guidelines, policies, and norms of Infosys. You will be part of a learning culture where teamwork and collaboration are encouraged, excellence is rewarded, and diversity is respected and valued.
Required Qualifications:Bachelor’s degree or foreign equivalent required from an accredited institution. Will also consider three years of progressive experience in the specialty in lieu of every year of education.At least 7 years of relevant Information Technology experienceU.S. Citizens or those authorized to work in the US are encouraged to apply. Candidate must be located within commuting distance of San Francisco, CA or be willing to relocate to the area. At least 4 years of Manhattan Active Omni experience. Experience in understanding configuration and customizing Manhattan Active Omni suite of applications.Experience in Manhattan Active Omni suite of applications includes (Order Management, Enterprise inventory, Digital Self-Service and Virtual Assistant Support, Call Center management, Store management and POS)
Preferred Qualifications:At least 4 years of experience in understanding of Order management and Supply Chain functions.Experience in Order Management system or point of sale/Store Management system or E-Commerce is a strong plus (MAO, DOM, POS, Sterling OMS)Experience in Inventory Management, Order Orchestration (B2B and B2C)Experience with databases.Experience in cloud implementation and execution.Experience in Ability to perform High Level solution design aligned with the requirements.Experience in Suggest and validate various solution options for the requirements.Experience in Taking decisions independently and interact directly with customers and drive the solution till go live liaising with the key stakeholders.Experience in Interacting with Solution Architect and get involved into Design workshops, build Solution design.Experience in GAP assessment in Requirements and feasibility/infeasibility clearly articulated to Clients.Experience in Preparing/Reviewing Solution/Functional Design/Detailed Design specs.Experience in Writing Technical design documents and coding of solutions in Java, Json.Experience in Coordinating with the customer & offshore team to resolve queries or clarifications.Experience in Providing support for Project estimations.Experience in Provide Solution leadership in the development / implementation project.Experience in product configuration and business process mapping.Experience in Understanding of GCP (added advantage if knowledge of AWS and Azure)Experience in Job Scheduling and Reporting
The job may entail extensive travel. The job may also entail sitting as well as working at a computer for extended periods of time. Candidates should be able to communicate by telephone, email or face to face.
Along with competitive pay, as a full-time Infosys employee you are also eligible for the following benefits:Medical/Dental/Vision/Life InsuranceLong-term/Short-term DisabilityHealth and Dependent Care Reimbursement AccountsInsurance (Accident, Critical Illness, Hospital Indemnity, Legal)401(k) plan and contributions dependent on salary levelPaid holidays plus Paid Time Off

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level

output_json.title: Manhattan Active Omni Consultant
output_json.summary: Seeking a Manhattan Active Omni Lead Consultant for Infosys.
job_responsibilities: Anchor different phases of engagements primarily related to Manhattan OMNI.
Functional consultation on the application, integration, and reports.
High-quality and value-adding solutions to customers.
Guidelines, policies, and norms of Infosys.

Insurance (Accident, Critical Illness, Hospital Indemnity, Legal)
